headline: TD Cowen Downgrades Fortive Corporation (FTV) Stock
summary: Fortive Corporation (NYSE:FTV) is one of the Best Beaten Down Stocks to Buy Now. TD Cowen downgraded the company’s stock to “Hold” from “Buy” with a price objective of $50, down from the prior target of $85, as reported by The Fly. Following the spinoff of Ralliant, the thesis on the new Fortive becomes less clear, noted the […]
